code: import React from"react";import"./Planters.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Planters=()=>{const products=[{name:"Tale Pot",price:350,originalPrice:450,discount:"25% off",image:"https://www.theplantshop.in/cdn/shop/files/wonder-planters-125-size-set-of-5-141868.jpg?v=1714058297&width=1946"},{name:"Ice Cream Pot",price:350,originalPrice:450,discount:"25% off",image:"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/71-2xw9GlmL.jpg"},{name:"Beige Fracture",price:350,originalPrice:450,discount:"25% off",image:"https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTMmO_nJQUfHaZLupFRgrst0vRg3JzaiBKjqsu3yseopbgfd2UrDDWzs4nPf0xuaU95kMc&usqp=CAU"},{name:"Mint Fusion",price:350,originalPrice:450,discount:"25% off",image:"https://plantlane.com/cdn/shop/files/DSC09758_533x.jpg?v=1712320644"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"planters",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"Planters-title",children:"Planters"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-grid",children:products.map((product,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-image-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name,className:"product-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"product-discount",children:product.discount})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"product-name",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"product-price",children:["\u20B9 ",product.price," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"original-price",children:["\u20B9 ",product.originalPrice]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"buy-btn",children:"Buy"})]})]},index))})]});};export default Planters;
